mapper.sql: id AS "id", testing AS "testing", serial_number AS "serialNumber", blue_island_materiel_number AS "blueIslandMaterielNumber", supplier_materiel_number AS "supplierMaterielNumber", description AS "description", supplier AS "supplier", dosage_of_plus AS "dosageOfPlus", dosage_of_lite AS "dosageOfLite", supplier_good_products AS "supplierGoodProducts", supplier_bad_products AS "supplierBadProducts", supplier_return_goods AS "supplierReturnGoods", out_warehouse AS "outWarehouse", delivery AS "delivery", theoretically_usefully AS "theoreticallyUsefully", actually_usefully AS "actuallyUsefully", order_amount AS "orderAmount", unpaid_amount AS "unpaidAmount", replies AS "replies", create_by AS "createBy.id", create_date AS "createDate", update_by AS "updateBy.id", update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager_summary_consider_bom_details( id, serial_number, testing, texy, blue_island_materiel_number, chinese_name, supplier, m_four_host, m_four_go_host, m_four_front_housing_assembly, m_four_rear_housing_assembly, m_four_package, m_four_orange, m_four_sfr, m_four_byt, m_four_go_package, m_four_front_housing_assembly_second, m_four_main_board_package, m_four_go_main_board_package, small_board_packaging, battery_packaging, into_operation, not_into_operation, lack_of_material, lack_of_material_group, new_jersey, blue_island, difference, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date )VALUES ( #{id}, #{serialNumber}, #{testing}, #{texy}, #{blueIslandMaterielNumber}, #{chineseName}, #{supplier}, #{mFourHost}, #{mFourGoHost}, #{mFourFrontHousingAssembly}, #{mFourRearHousingAssembly}, #{mFourPackage}, #{mFourOrange}, #{mFourSFR}, #{mFourBYT}, #{mFourGoPackage}, #{mFourFrontHousingAssemblySecond}, #{mFourMainBoardPackage}, #{mFourGoMainBoardPackage}, #{smallBoardPackaging}, #{batteryPackaging}, #{intoOperation}, #{notIntoOperation}, #{lackOfMaterial}, #{lackOfMaterialGroup}, #{newJersey}, #{blueIsland}, #{difference}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE manager_summary_consider_bom_details SET serialNumber = #{serialNumber}, testing = #{testing}, texy = #{texy}, blue_island_materiel_number = #{blueIslandMaterielNumber}, chinese_name = #{chineseName}, supplier = #{supplier}, m_four_host = #{mFourHost}, m_four_go_host = #{mFourGoHost}, m_four_front_housing_assembly = #{mFourFrontHousingAssembly}, m_four_rear_housing_assembly = #{mFourRearHousingAssembly}, m_four_package = #{mFourPackage}, m_four_orange = #{mFourOrange}, m_four_sfr = #{mFourSFR}, m_four_byt = #{mFourBYT}, m_four_go_package = #{mFourGoPackage}, m_four_front_housing_assembly_second = #{mFourFrontHousingAssemblySecond}, m_four_main_board_package = #{mFourMainBoardPackage}, m_four_go_main_board_package = #{mFourGoMainBoardPackage}, small_board_packaging = #{smallBoardPackaging}, battery_packaging = #{batteryPackaging}, into_operation = #{intoOperation}, not_into_operation = #{notIntoOperation}, lack_of_material = #{lackOfMaterial}, lack_of_material_group = #{lackOfMaterialGroup}, new_jersey = #{newJersey}, blue_island = #{blueIsland}, difference = #{difference}, remarks = #{remarks}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE manager_summary_consider_bom_details SET is_delete = 0 WHERE id=#{id}
